description:
Save partial form progress automatically and allow users to resume incomplete forms after navigating away or session timeout. Show clear progress indicators and estimated completion time for long forms.

**Rationale:** Users often get interrupted while filling complex forms (engagements, policy briefs, etc.). Losing all entered data creates frustration and discourages completion. Auto-save reduces anxiety and improves completion rates.
title: Multi-Step Form Progress Persistence and Recovery
